sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The AbiWord package contains abiword, ttfadmin.sh and ttftool.

sect3.title: abiword
sect3.para: abiword is a symlink to the main AbiWord executable.

sect3.title: ttfadmin.sh
sect3.para: ttfadmin.sh generates support files required by AbiWord for each TrueType font in a given directory.

sect3.title: ttftool
sect3.para: ttftool is an utility for processing TrueType fonts.
